mods.abstract: Championship boxing team poses for a photograph. Included are Martin Reagin, Gene Johnson, William Johnston, Marlin Johnston, William Wilkerson, John Thomas, Joe Caccamisi, Charley Tracy, Bobby Hunter, J. Anderson, N. Bracken, Louis Pierini, V. Tuminello, Steve Wilkerson, George Danelly, Joe Lucchesi, and Henry True. Some of the boys were wearing CBC belt buckles.
